title: Add a way to filter metrics by prefix in the MetricsHandler API
description: It would be nice to have a way to filter metrics by prefix in addition to the group and type filters already available.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: Patch which adds a "prefix" parameter to the MetricsHandler that shows only those metrics which match the given prefix
